full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA 'KHYER BDE BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I 'KHYER BDE BA 'DI NAS, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN DBANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS TSUL 'KHRIMS RNAM DAG MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA SMYUNG GNAS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DANG GOS RTZIS KYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN DIM CHI BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR, ^BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL PA, ^BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING DANG CHOS SKYONG GZHAN LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MI MTHONG ZHING ,BLA MA YI DAM RNAMS KYI TSOGS MCHOD RNAMS YE SHES KYIS 'GRE NAS 'BRIS PA 'DI MA LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA DANG TSUL MTSAN PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA TSOGS DANG ,KHYAD PAR LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD PAR GSOL LO, , SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA NGES BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DAM TSI NYAMS CHAGS SDIG SGRIB BYANG ZHING DAG NAS, BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN DON DU MCHOG MTHUN GYI DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O,,)
